body:
When running v1.2 kubectl tests against v1.1; e.g. https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/70

_/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/kubectl.go:179 Expected error: <errors.errorString | 0xc2085666f0>: { s: "Error running &{/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/platforms/linux/amd64/kubectl [kubectl --server=https://104.154.27.241 --kubeconfig=/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/.kube/config create -f /jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook --namespace=e2e-tests-kubectl-p9ue1] [] service "frontend" created
service "redis-master" created
service "redis-slave" created
 error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/frontend-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false
error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-master-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false
error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-slave-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false
 [] 0xc2084f8580 exit status 1 true [0xc2083f6110 0xc2083f6130 0xc2083f6150] [0xc2083f6110 0xc2083f6130 0xc2083f6150] [0xc2083f6128 0xc2083f6148] [0x963fe0 0x963fe0] 0xc2083f8420}:
Command stdout:
service "frontend" created
service "redis-master" created
service "redis-slave" created

stderr:
error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/frontend-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false
error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-master-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false
error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-slave-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false

error:
exit status 1
", } Error running &{/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/platforms/linux/amd64/kubectl [kubectl --server=https://104.154.27.241 --kubeconfig=/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/.kube/config create -f /jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook --namespace=e2e-tests-kubectl-p9ue1] [] service "frontend" created service "redis-master" created service "redis-slave" created error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/frontend-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-master-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-slave-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false [] 0xc2084f8580 exit status 1 true [0xc2083f6110 0xc2083f6130 0xc2083f6150] [0xc2083f6110 0xc2083f6130 0xc2083f6150] [0xc2083f6128 0xc2083f6148] [0x963fe0 0x963fe0] 0xc2083f8420}: Command stdout: service "frontend" created service "redis-master" created service "redis-slave" created stderr: error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/frontend-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-master-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false error validating "/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-e2e-gke-1.1-1.2-kubectl-skew/workspace/kubernetes/examples/guestbook/redis-slave-deployment.yaml": error validating data: couldn't find type: v1beta1.Deployment; if you choose to ignore these errors, turn validation off with --validate=false error: exit status 1 not to have occurred_

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: v1.2 kubectl test can't see v1beta1.Deployment object
